00028 #ifndef EGG_COMPILATION

00030 #define _(x) dgettext (GETTEXT_PACKAGE, x)
00031 #define N_(x) x
00032 #endif
00033 #else
00034 #define _(x) x
00035 #define N_(x) x

00038 #define SYSTEM_TRAY_REQUEST_DOCK        0
00039 #define SYSTEM_TRAY_BEGIN_MESSAGE    1
00040 #define SYSTEM_TRAY_CANCEL_MESSAGE  2
00041 
00042 #define SYSTEM_TRAY_ORIENTATION_HORZ 0
00043 #define SYSTEM_TRAY_ORIENTATION_VERT 1
00044 
00045 enum {
00046     PROP_0,
00047     PROP_ORIENTATION
00048 };

00065 GType
00066 egg_tray_icon_get_type (void)
00067 {
00068     static GType our_type = 0;
00069 
00070     if (our_type == 0) {
00071         static const GTypeInfo our_info = {
00072             sizeof (EggTrayIconClass),
00073             (GBaseInitFunc) NULL,
00074             (GBaseFinalizeFunc) NULL,
00075             (GClassInitFunc) egg_tray_icon_class_init,
00076             NULL,   /* class_finalize */
00077             NULL,   /* class_data */
00078             sizeof (EggTrayIcon),
00079             0,  /* n_preallocs */
00080             (GInstanceInitFunc) egg_tray_icon_init
00081         };
00082 
00083         our_type =
00084             g_type_register_static (GTK_TYPE_PLUG, "EggTrayIcon",
00085                         &our_info, 0);
00086     }
00087 
00088     return our_type;
00089 }

00091 static void
00092 egg_tray_icon_init (EggTrayIcon * icon)
00093 {
00094     icon->stamp = 1;
00095     icon->orientation = GTK_ORIENTATION_HORIZONTAL;
00096 
00097     gtk_widget_add_events (GTK_WIDGET (icon),
00098                    GDK_PROPERTY_CHANGE_MASK);
00099 }

00101 static void
00102 egg_tray_icon_class_init (EggTrayIconClass * klass)
00103 {
00104     GObjectClass *gobject_class = (GObjectClass *) klass;
00105     GtkWidgetClass *widget_class = (GtkWidgetClass *) klass;
00106 
00107     parent_class = g_type_class_peek_parent (klass);
00108 
00109     gobject_class->get_property = egg_tray_icon_get_property;
00110 
00111     widget_class->realize = egg_tray_icon_realize;
00112     widget_class->unrealize = egg_tray_icon_unrealize;
00113 
00114     g_object_class_install_property (gobject_class,
00115                      PROP_ORIENTATION,
00116                      g_param_spec_enum ("orientation",
00117                                 _("Orientation"),
00118                                 _("The orientation of the tray."),
00119                                 GTK_TYPE_ORIENTATION,
00120                                 GTK_ORIENTATION_HORIZONTAL,
00121                                 G_PARAM_READABLE));
00122 }
00123 
00124 static void
00125 egg_tray_icon_get_property (GObject * object,
00126                 guint prop_id,
00127                 GValue * value, GParamSpec * pspec)
00128 {
00129     EggTrayIcon *icon = EGG_TRAY_ICON (object);
00130 
00131     switch (prop_id) {
00132     case PROP_ORIENTATION:
00133         g_value_set_enum (value, icon->orientation);
00134         break;
00135     default:
00136         G_OBJECT_WARN_INVALID_PROPERTY_ID (object, prop_id, pspec);
00137         break;
00138     }
00139 }
00140 
00141 static void
00142 egg_tray_icon_get_orientation_property (EggTrayIcon * icon)
00143 {
00144     Display *xdisplay;
00145     Atom type;
00146     int format;
00147     union {
00148         gulong *prop;
00149         guchar *prop_ch;
00150     } prop = {
00151     NULL};
00152     gulong nitems;
00153     gulong bytes_after;
00154     int error, result;
00155 
00156     g_assert (icon->manager_window != None);
00157 
00158     xdisplay =
00159         GDK_DISPLAY_XDISPLAY (gtk_widget_get_display
00160                   (GTK_WIDGET (icon)));
00161 
00162     gdk_error_trap_push ();
00163     type = None;
00164     result = XGetWindowProperty (xdisplay,
00165                      icon->manager_window,
00166                      icon->orientation_atom,
00167                      0, G_MAXLONG, FALSE,
00168                      XA_CARDINAL,
00169                      &type, &format, &nitems,
00170                      &bytes_after, &(prop.prop_ch));
00171     error = gdk_error_trap_pop ();
00172 
00173     if (error || result != Success)
00174         return;
00175 
00176     if (type == XA_CARDINAL) {
00177         GtkOrientation orientation;
00178 
00179         orientation =
00180             (prop.prop[0] ==
00181              SYSTEM_TRAY_ORIENTATION_HORZ) ?
00182             GTK_ORIENTATION_HORIZONTAL : GTK_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL;
00183 
00184         if (icon->orientation != orientation) {
00185             icon->orientation = orientation;
00186 
00187             g_object_notify (G_OBJECT (icon), "orientation");
00188         }
00189     }
00190 
00191     if (prop.prop)
00192         XFree (prop.prop);
00193 }
00194 
00195 static GdkFilterReturn
00196 egg_tray_icon_manager_filter (GdkXEvent * xevent, GdkEvent * event,
00197                   gpointer user_data)
00198 {
00199     EggTrayIcon *icon = user_data;
00200     XEvent *xev = (XEvent *) xevent;
00201 
00202     if (xev->xany.type == ClientMessage &&
00203         xev->xclient.message_type == icon->manager_atom &&
00204         xev->xclient.data.l[1] == icon->selection_atom) {
00205         egg_tray_icon_update_manager_window (icon);
00206     } else if (xev->xany.window == icon->manager_window) {
00207         if (xev->xany.type == PropertyNotify &&
00208             xev->xproperty.atom == icon->orientation_atom) {
00209             egg_tray_icon_get_orientation_property (icon);
00210         }
00211         if (xev->xany.type == DestroyNotify) {
00212             egg_tray_icon_update_manager_window (icon);
00213         }
00214     }
00215 
00216     return GDK_FILTER_CONTINUE;
00217 }
00218 
00219 static void
00220 egg_tray_icon_unrealize (GtkWidget * widget)
00221 {
00222     EggTrayIcon *icon = EGG_TRAY_ICON (widget);
00223     GdkWindow *root_window;
00224 
00225     if (icon->manager_window != None) {
00226         GdkWindow *gdkwin;
00227 
00228         gdkwin =
00229             gdk_window_lookup_for_display (gtk_widget_get_display
00230                            (widget),
00231                            icon->manager_window);
00232 
00233         gdk_window_remove_filter (gdkwin,
00234                       egg_tray_icon_manager_filter,
00235                       icon);
00236     }
00237 
00238     root_window =
00239         gdk_screen_get_root_window (gtk_widget_get_screen (widget));
00240 
00241     gdk_window_remove_filter (root_window,
00242                   egg_tray_icon_manager_filter, icon);
00243 
00244     if (GTK_WIDGET_CLASS (parent_class)->unrealize)
00245         (*GTK_WIDGET_CLASS (parent_class)->unrealize) (widget);
00246 }
00247 
00248 static void
00249 egg_tray_icon_send_manager_message (EggTrayIcon * icon,
00250                     long message,
00251                     Window window,
00252                     long data1, long data2, long data3)
00253 {
00254     XClientMessageEvent ev;
00255     Display *display;
00256 
00257     ev.type = ClientMessage;
00258     ev.window = window;
00259     ev.message_type = icon->system_tray_opcode_atom;
00260     ev.format = 32;
00261     ev.data.l[0] = gdk_x11_get_server_time (GTK_WIDGET (icon)->window);
00262     ev.data.l[1] = message;
00263     ev.data.l[2] = data1;
00264     ev.data.l[3] = data2;
00265     ev.data.l[4] = data3;
00266 
00267     display =
00268         GDK_DISPLAY_XDISPLAY (gtk_widget_get_display
00269                   (GTK_WIDGET (icon)));
00270 
00271     gdk_error_trap_push ();
00272     XSendEvent (display,
00273             icon->manager_window, False, NoEventMask,
00274             (XEvent *) & ev);
00275     XSync (display, False);
00276     gdk_error_trap_pop ();
00277 }
00278 
00279 static void
00280 egg_tray_icon_send_dock_request (EggTrayIcon * icon)
00281 {
00282     egg_tray_icon_send_manager_message (icon,
00283                         SYSTEM_TRAY_REQUEST_DOCK,
00284                         icon->manager_window,
00285                         gtk_plug_get_id (GTK_PLUG
00286                                  (icon)), 0,
00287                         0);
00288 }
00289 
00290 static void
00291 egg_tray_icon_update_manager_window (EggTrayIcon * icon)
00292 {
00293     Display *xdisplay;
00294 
00295     xdisplay =
00296         GDK_DISPLAY_XDISPLAY (gtk_widget_get_display
00297                   (GTK_WIDGET (icon)));
00298 
00299     if (icon->manager_window != None) {
00300         GdkWindow *gdkwin;
00301 
00302         gdkwin =
00303             gdk_window_lookup_for_display (gtk_widget_get_display
00304                            (GTK_WIDGET (icon)),
00305                            icon->manager_window);
00306 
00307         gdk_window_remove_filter (gdkwin,
00308                       egg_tray_icon_manager_filter,
00309                       icon);
00310     }
00311 
00312     XGrabServer (xdisplay);
00313 
00314     icon->manager_window = XGetSelectionOwner (xdisplay,
00315                            icon->selection_atom);
00316 
00317     if (icon->manager_window != None)
00318         XSelectInput (xdisplay,
00319                   icon->manager_window,
00320                   StructureNotifyMask | PropertyChangeMask);
00321 
00322     XUngrabServer (xdisplay);
00323     XFlush (xdisplay);
00324 
00325     if (icon->manager_window != None) {
00326         GdkWindow *gdkwin;
00327 
00328         gdkwin =
00329             gdk_window_lookup_for_display (gtk_widget_get_display
00330                            (GTK_WIDGET (icon)),
00331                            icon->manager_window);
00332 
00333         gdk_window_add_filter (gdkwin,
00334                        egg_tray_icon_manager_filter, icon);
00335 
00336         /* Send a request that we'd like to dock */
00337         egg_tray_icon_send_dock_request (icon);
00338 
00339         egg_tray_icon_get_orientation_property (icon);
00340     }
00341 }
00342 
00343 static void
00344 egg_tray_icon_realize (GtkWidget * widget)
00345 {
00346     EggTrayIcon *icon = EGG_TRAY_ICON (widget);
00347     GdkScreen *screen;
00348     GdkDisplay *display;
00349     Display *xdisplay;
00350     char buffer[256];
00351     GdkWindow *root_window;
00352 
00353     if (GTK_WIDGET_CLASS (parent_class)->realize)
00354         GTK_WIDGET_CLASS (parent_class)->realize (widget);
00355 
00356     screen = gtk_widget_get_screen (widget);
00357     display = gdk_screen_get_display (screen);
00358     xdisplay = gdk_x11_display_get_xdisplay (display);
00359 
00360     /* Now see if there's a manager window around */
00361     g_snprintf (buffer, sizeof (buffer),
00362             "_NET_SYSTEM_TRAY_S%d",
00363             gdk_screen_get_number (screen));
00364 
00365     icon->selection_atom = XInternAtom (xdisplay, buffer, False);
00366 
00367     icon->manager_atom = XInternAtom (xdisplay, "MANAGER", False);
00368 
00369     icon->system_tray_opcode_atom = XInternAtom (xdisplay,
00370                              "_NET_SYSTEM_TRAY_OPCODE",
00371                              False);
00372 
00373     icon->orientation_atom = XInternAtom (xdisplay,
00374                           "_NET_SYSTEM_TRAY_ORIENTATION",
00375                           False);
00376 
00377     egg_tray_icon_update_manager_window (icon);
00378 
00379     root_window = gdk_screen_get_root_window (screen);
00380 
00381     /* Add a root window filter so that we get changes on MANAGER */
00382     gdk_window_add_filter (root_window,
00383                    egg_tray_icon_manager_filter, icon);
00384 }

00386 EggTrayIcon *
00387 egg_tray_icon_new_for_xscreen (Screen * xscreen, const char *name)
00388 {
00389     GdkDisplay *display;
00390     GdkScreen *screen;
00391 
00392     display = gdk_x11_lookup_xdisplay (DisplayOfScreen (xscreen));
00393     screen =
00394         gdk_display_get_screen (display,
00395                     XScreenNumberOfScreen (xscreen));
00396 
00397     return egg_tray_icon_new_for_screen (screen, name);
00398 }

00400 EggTrayIcon *
00401 egg_tray_icon_new_for_screen (GdkScreen * screen, const char *name)
00402 {
00403     g_return_val_if_fail (GDK_IS_SCREEN (screen), NULL);
00404 
00405     return g_object_new (EGG_TYPE_TRAY_ICON, "screen", screen, "title",
00406                  name, NULL);
00407 }

00409 EggTrayIcon *
00410 egg_tray_icon_new (const gchar * name)
00411 {
00412     return g_object_new (EGG_TYPE_TRAY_ICON, "title", name, NULL);
00413 }
00414 
00415 guint
00416 egg_tray_icon_send_message (EggTrayIcon * icon,
00417                 gint timeout, const gchar * message, gint len)
00418 {
00419     guint stamp;
00420 
00421     g_return_val_if_fail (EGG_IS_TRAY_ICON (icon), 0);
00422     g_return_val_if_fail (timeout >= 0, 0);
00423     g_return_val_if_fail (message != NULL, 0);
00424 
00425     if (icon->manager_window == None)
00426         return 0;
00427 
00428     if (len < 0)
00429         len = strlen (message);
00430 
00431     stamp = icon->stamp++;
00432 
00433     /* Get ready to send the message */
00434     egg_tray_icon_send_manager_message (icon,
00435                         SYSTEM_TRAY_BEGIN_MESSAGE,
00436                         (Window)
00437                         gtk_plug_get_id (GTK_PLUG
00438                                  (icon)),
00439                         timeout, len, stamp);
00440 
00441     /* Now to send the actual message */
00442     gdk_error_trap_push ();
00443     while (len > 0) {
00444         XClientMessageEvent ev;
00445         Display *xdisplay;
00446 
00447         xdisplay =
00448             GDK_DISPLAY_XDISPLAY (gtk_widget_get_display
00449                       (GTK_WIDGET (icon)));
00450 
00451         ev.type = ClientMessage;
00452         ev.window = (Window) gtk_plug_get_id (GTK_PLUG (icon));
00453         ev.format = 8;
00454         ev.message_type = XInternAtom (xdisplay,
00455                            "_NET_SYSTEM_TRAY_MESSAGE_DATA",
00456                            False);
00457         if (len > 20) {
00458             memcpy (&ev.data, message, 20);
00459             len -= 20;
00460             message += 20;
00461         } else {
00462             memcpy (&ev.data, message, len);
00463             len = 0;
00464         }
00465 
00466         XSendEvent (xdisplay,
00467                 icon->manager_window, False,
00468                 StructureNotifyMask, (XEvent *) & ev);
00469         XSync (xdisplay, False);
00470     }
00471     gdk_error_trap_pop ();
00472 
00473     return stamp;
00474 }
00475 
00476 void
00477 egg_tray_icon_cancel_message (EggTrayIcon * icon, guint id)
00478 {
00479     g_return_if_fail (EGG_IS_TRAY_ICON (icon));
00480     g_return_if_fail (id > 0);
00481 
00482     egg_tray_icon_send_manager_message (icon,
00483                         SYSTEM_TRAY_CANCEL_MESSAGE,
00484                         (Window)
00485                         gtk_plug_get_id (GTK_PLUG
00486                                  (icon)), id,
00487                         0, 0);
00488 }
00489 
00490 GtkOrientation
00491 egg_tray_icon_get_orientation (EggTrayIcon * icon)
00492 {
00493     g_return_val_if_fail (EGG_IS_TRAY_ICON (icon),
00494                   GTK_ORIENTATION_HORIZONTAL);
00495 
00496     return icon->orientation;
00497 }
